result.title: Help in Geometry Problem POJ-1927 Area in triangle.
result.content: Can someone explain me how to solve this problem http://poj.org/problem?id=1927 If the length of rope is smaller than the perimeter of circle with radius equal to radius of inscribed circle, we can directly find the answer. But, how to deal with cases when length of the rope is greater than perimeter of such circle and less than perimeter of triangle.
